title: How the iPhone changed everything
description:
The smartphone landscape hasn’t been the same since Steve Jobs announced the first iPhone in 2007. Peter Kafka (@pkafka) explores the legacy of this game-changing device in the first episode of the new season of Land of the Giants.

References: 
Listen to Land of the Giants here
